resource.item: One of the elementary space resources. Combine with Endurium to create Prometid.
One of the elementary space resources. Combine with either Prometium to create Prometid or Terbium to create Duranium.
One of the elementary space resources. Combine with Endurium to create Duranium.
Required to create Promerium on your ship and in the Skylab
Created from 10 Prometid and 10 Duranium, Requires: Xenomit
Created in the tech center using 10 Promerium. Xeno module also required.
Palladium can be collected on the Maps 5-1 and 5-3. On Map 5-2 it can be exchanged with Galaxy Gate Energy.
Log-disks can be exchanged for pilot points.
Used to open pirate booty and collect the valuable treasure contained within.
Required to open valuable green pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open valuable red pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open valuable blue pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open any valuable silver Pirate Booty and collect fabulous treasures.
The log-disk deal: Available now for a limited time only. Act now and rake in up to 160% savings with this unbelievable offer!
The booty key deal: Available now and only for a limited time. Act now and rake in up to 160% savings with this unbelievable offer!
Piece of the Apis pirate drone blueprint
A piece of the Zeus pirate drone blueprints.
The Starjet's top model: Small and agile, but very deadly!
The best Star Hunter: You'll have (almost) nothing to fear in this ship!
The ultimate Battlecruiser: The only true ship for hotshot space pilots!
The Citadel, also known as the group's "tank", is a heavy-duty cruiser with two slots for rocket-launchers and the following abilities:
The Aegis, also known as the must-have for every battle, is a medium-duty engineering ship featuring the following abilities:
The Spearhead, also known as the group's scout, is a light-duty recon ship boasting the following abilities:
A special design for the BigBoy. You can only use it if you already own a BigBoy.
The Solemn Design for the Bigboy gives you a 10% bonus on all experience points gained!
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.

A 5% damage bonus makes the Enforcer Goliath design a force to be reckoned with and a must for every clan. Revolutionize the art of warfare with its destructive power and strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.

Thanks to its 5% damage bonus, you can count on the Revenge Vengeance design to deal the deathblow in any encounter - the kind of advantage that can truly make a difference. This is your best bet for counterattacks on enemy clans or quick alien kills.
With 10% more shield strength, the Bastion design is the perfect defense in every combat situation. Even the most powerful enemies and aliens will have a hard time taking you down.
Thanks to 10% extra shield power, the Avenger is a must-have for every space battle.

Looking for more experience points? Then get the new Adept design. It'll give you a 10% bonus on all experience points gained in the game!

Fly around in this slick design and watch your enemies die with envy!

Honor to whom honor is due! The impressive Corsair design awards you with an extra 10% honor points earned in the game.

Earn your just reward for your heroism and get this design.

This design will let you dish out 5% more damage and completely change. It will also give you the unique "Afterburner" ability which you can use to boost your ship's speed by 30% for a period of five seconds!
This sleek and glossy ship design in white grants you a 10% bonus on all the experience points you collect!
This new red design gets you 10% more honor points and scares the daylights out of your enemies.

This design not only gives your Goliath Battlecruiser a completely new look but it also lets you repair your ship hull and the hulls of group members immediately with the "Nano-Cluster Repairer". It also increases your shield power by 10%.

This design doesn't just change the look of your Goliath Battlecruiser. Use its "Weaken Shield" ability to increase damage to enemy shields by 50%, though your shield's strength will be reduced by 30% once the effect wears off. Not only that, but you'll also do an extra 5% damage.

Change the look of your Goliath Battlecruiser and render enemy laser attacks almost useless with this design's "prismatic shielding" capability. It'll also temporarily weaken your own lasers, but give you 10% more shield power in return.

Give your Goliath Battlecruiser a futuristic new look with the Sentinel design. Its "fortress" capability will give your shields a massive power boost, and you'll also benefit from a 10% shield bonus.
Breathe life into your Goliath Battlecruiser with this brand-new design. It'll give your ship a 5% damage bonus and its singularity function will give you a massive damage boost temporarily.
A special design for the Goliath Battlecruiser. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.
Kick design for the Goliath with a 10% shield bonus. Soccer crazy?? Then act now and show off your passion for the beautiful game!
Referee design for the Goliath. Exude authority with this design and increase your damage by 5%.
Goal design for the Goliath with a 10% XP bonus. Soccer crazy?? Then act now and bring soccer to space!
The Centaur Goliath Design has an unbeatable 10% Hitpoint Bonus. Act now and fortify your defenses.
The Veteran Design for the Spearhead ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. Take point as the Spearhead of any offensive with a scout ship in a class of its own!

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Spearhead's skills: 50% increase for Ultimate Cloak and Recon skills and 25% decrease for Target Marker. The cool down of the JAMX will be increased by 15%. Make your Spearhead an elite force to be reckoned with!
The Veteran Design for the Aegis ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. You can be confident that your squad will benefit from the best supply ship available under your Aegis!

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Aegis' skills: 50% increase for Repair Pod, 20% decrease for Shield Repair and 10% decrease for HP Repair.
The Veteran Design for the Citadel ship comes with a 5% bonus to XP and Honor Points. Raise your Citadel to the sky with this astonishing flying fortress!

Not only does this design look menacing, it comes with 5% more damage plus the following changes to the duration of the Citadel's skills: 50% increase for Protection, 50% increase for Draw Fire, 25% decrease in Fortify and 15% decrease for Travel. Make your Citadel an elite force to be reckoned with!

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Vanquisher design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to MMO. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for MMO, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Sovereign design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to EIC. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for EIC, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.

A special, limited edition Goliath, the Peacemaker design is only available to pilots who are truly loyal to VRU. It will not only provide a 5% bonus to all Influence earned for VRU, but will also grant a 7% damage bonus against rival human pilots.
A special design for the Nostromo. You can only use it if you already own a Nostromo.
A special design for the Goliath. You can only use it if you already own a Goliath.

Onu kullandığın sürece, topladığın bütün Hasar Puanları için % 5 ve bütün Şeref Puanı için % 10 bonus kazanırsın. Goliath için özel bir tasarım. Sadece bir Goliath sahibi olunduğunda kullanılabilinir.
You are already using this design.
All Clan members receive more honor points
The cornerstone of any Battle Station
Small laser: causes up to 40 damage points per round
Average laser: causes up to 60 damage points per round
Strong laser: causes up to 100 damage points per round
Much stronger laser: Causes up to 150 damage points per round
Uber laser: Causes up to 200 damage points per round.

The rapid reloader!
This rocket launcher makes it possible to win a battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 3 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.

The rapid reloader!
This upgraded version of the Hellstorm launcher 1 makes it possible to win the battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 5 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.
Short-range rocket: causes up to 1,000 damage points per rocket fired
Mid-range rocket: causes up to 2,000 damage points per rocket fired
Long-range rocket: causes up to 4,000 points per rocket fired

Each rocket inflicts a max. of 6,000 HP of damage, but has a lower accuracy rate due to its impressive firepower.
An exceptional weapon when used in combination with the Tech Center's precision targeter.
This plasma charger temporarily reduces the accuracy of your enemy's weapons system, offering you a number of tactical advantages.
40% reduction of target's accuracy for 5 seconds
Hit your opponent with a deceleration rocket to slow them down by %AMOUNT%% for %TIME% seconds.
Reduces target's speed by 30% for 5 seconds
Hologram-emitter rockets create a temporary hologram around a ship to alter its actual appearance.

The EMP burst releases an electromagnetic pulse wave to temporarily short-circuit your enemies' onboard instruments and disable their targeting devices. If you're really lucky, the burst will also uncloak them, allowing you to shoot them out of the sky like birds.

Give your foes a frosty reception! Hit your target and render it motionless for a whole two seconds. EMPs as well as the abilities "Afterburner" (Lightning ship design) and "Travel" (Citadel) can protect you against these freezing long-range rockets!
Freeze your enemies for two seconds and slow them down considerably
Proximity mine: causes 100% uncloaking upon detonation

Proximity mine:
50% shield damage upon detonation; combinable with other mine types

Proximity mine:
20% direct damage calculated from ship's base HP and pilot-bio upgrades - powerful enough to destroy enemy ships entirely!
Slows your opponent for %TIME% seconds by %AMOUNT%%. Furthermore, it takes effect in just 1 second.
Despite their small size, these tiny firecrackers can really create an explosive display.
A superior class of fireworks with magnificent explosions to let you temporarily light up the dark galaxy.
First-rate fireworks with spectacular explosions to make others stop and stare.
Light the fuse on these special fireworks to show everyone in orbit your true colors!

Double the rockets, double the trouble!
Upon being fired from the rocket launcher, these rockets will rapidly descend upon their target and scorch it with a near apocalyptic explosion. Fired off in a broadside, they will cause even more damage, hitting an enemy ship from multiple sides to weaken its hull structure.

Your rocket launcher will fire salvos of UBR-100 rockets. Their optimized warheads are at least 80% more effective against aliens, and they also utilize the multi-angle damage feature of conventional Hellstorm rockets.
The multi-angle damage rocket for smart spenders. Your toughest enemies won't stand a chance against the many broadsides of the ECO Hellstorm.
The Hellstorm SAR-01, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The Hellstorm SAR-02, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The combo rocket will help you make a name for yourself. A combination of high damage infliction and Shield Leech is a one-two punch your enemies won't soon forget.
Cause extensive damage to aliens of max. 7,500 per shot! On other pilot's ships, they only cause a max. 4,000 damage per hit.
Absolutely bombastic - light up your enemies like the 4th of July with this special "birthday candle."
Low efficiency for a low price
More bang for your buck: x2 laser damage per round
This is the best standard laser ammo on the market. x3 laser damage per round
Available for limited time only! Radioactive Elite munition with 4x normal damage.
Special ammunition that reinforces your Shield, strengthening it by tapping into enemy shields (Shield Leech).
One type of ammo you just can't do without: Rain death on your enemies when you fire off a rapid laser salvo.
Combo 100 is a rare ammunition that inflicts the damage of the MCB-50 ammo along with half of the SAB-50 ammo's Shield Leech effect.
Multiplies Laser Damage x3 / Shield Leech x1
The Jack-O-Battery is a rare Halloween Ammo that causes 3.5 times the damage to NPCs and twice the damage to other players.
Multiplies Laser Damage x2 PVP / x3.5 PVE
This special-order ammo developed from rare Radiatium packs a wallop: 4 times stronger than conventional lasers when used on anything but Demaner hulls, against which it deals 8-fold damage!
4 times stronger than a conventional laser. 8 times the damage against Demaner freighters.
Deals 20% damage, doesn't affect your ship
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 165 seconds
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 120 seconds
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 105 seconds.
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 90 seconds.
This repair bot recovers your ship's hull in 180 seconds
Ship stays cloaked until your first attack
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
10 ship cloakings (active until your first attack)
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
Cloak your ship 50 times and stay invisible until you launch an attack yourself.
WARNING: Enemies can still see cloaked ships on the mini map.
Boosts rockets and lasers with raw materials currently in lab use
Boosts rockets with raw materials currently in lab use
Boosts lasers with raw materials currently in lab use
x2 cargo space thanks to molecular compression
This CPU automatically repairs your drones when they sustain more than 70% damage upon ship destruction, as long as you have enough Uridium or Credits (depends on the drone type). Good for 8 repairs.

This CPU automatically repairs your drones when they have received the maximum damage upon ship destruction, as long as you have enough Uridium or Credits (depends on the drone type). Good for 32 repairs.
Displays diplomacy status on mini map
10 jumps to X-1 home map. You may not jump from farther out than map X-4 and NOT from PvP maps (4-X). May not be used during battle.
Jump to X-1 home map, works everywhere except the pirate sector. 20 total jumps. May not be used during battle.
Automatically buys 10,000 laser rounds if less than 1,000 rounds on board. Settings can be adjusted in Equipment.
Allows you to jump to any of the valid target maps. May not be used during battle.
Automatically buys 500 rockets of the selected rocket type when you have less than 100 left on board. To set the rocket type, click on Hangar -> Equipment.
Instant bomb made from 10 mines and 100 Xenomit; doesn't cause any damage to your ship
It has the same cool-down time as mines.
3-second protection against enemies; 10 mines and 100 Xenomit used every time
Makes your ship invulnerable for 3 seconds
It has the same cool-down time as mines.
Automatically gives your generators a boost using the best resources available
25% less chance that lasers will miss their target; 10 Xenomit used per volley
Click on the CPUs button in the shortcut bar to activate targeting guidance. Only one targeting guidance CPU allowed per configuration.
50% less chance that lasers will miss their target; 10 Xenomit used per volley
Click on the CPUs button in the shortcut bar to activate targeting guidance. Only one targeting guidance CPU allowed per configuration.
The rocket-launcher CPU automatically reloads your rocket launcher with a specified rocket type to rain fire on your enemies when you launch a laser attack.
After installation is completed, the RL-LB1 CPU must be activated on the space map in "CPUs".
25% less cool-down time for mines and items made from mines
50% less cool-down time for mines and items made from mines
Automatic rocket rapid fire during your laser attacks
After installation is completed, the AROL-X CPU must be activated on the space map in "CPUs".
Automatically buys 10,000 units of P.E.T. fuel when your fuel reserves fall below 1000 units.
Only one Automatic CPU Fuel Assistant is allowed per configuration.

With the HM7 trade drone, you can sell your ore no matter what orbit you're in. Why waste time going back to the space station?
Valid for 100 transactions.
You already have an unlimited trade drone.
You already have an active trade drone. If you buy this trade drone now, you'll receive 100 more transactions.
Only one of these items is allowed per configuration.

With the improved specifications of the Havoc design, more energy can be redirected to the laser components. If all of the drones are equipped with the Havoc design, then all of the of the drones will profit from a laser cannon efficiency bonus of 10%.
The improved design lets you transfer more energy to the drone's shield generators. If all of your drones have the Hercules design, you'll receive an additional 20% increase in HP.
Too many drones; you can't buy any more.
Gives you a %BOOSTERVALUE%% EP bonus. Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% honor; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% damage for all damage inflicted. Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% shield power; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% shield power; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
The Special Repair Booster ramps up your ship's repair speed by %BOOSTERVALUE%%. After activation, it is good for %HOURS% hours of play time. This item is not for sale and cannot be bought.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% faster ship repairs; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% shield regeneration speed; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
The resource booster increases the number of resources from collected NPC cargo boxes by %BOOSTERVALUE%%. The booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% ship HP; booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% HP; %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% bonus HP can be shared with friendly ships nearby
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% damage for damage inflicted. %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of bonus damage can be shared with friendly ships nearby
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
Increases ship's maximum shield power by %BOOSTERVALUE%% and allows you to share %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of this bonus with friendly ships nearby.
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% repair speed; increases ship repair speed. %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of this bonus can be shared with friendly ships nearby.
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
Increases the shield's regeneration speed by %BOOSTERVALUE%% and allows you to share %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of this bonus with friendly ships nearby.
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
The resource booster increases the number of resources from collected NPC cargo boxes by %BOOSTERVALUE%% and provides a %AREABOOSTERVALUE% % of this bonus for friendly ships in the vicinity.
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
Increases ship's maximum HP by %BOOSTERVALUE%% and allows you to share %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of this bonus with friendly ships nearby
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
+%BOOSTERVALUE%% EP; %AREABOOSTERVALUE%% of this EP bonus can be shared with friendly ships nearby
Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase. It has a %MAXBOOST%% maximum boost level.
As long as it is active, this booster doubles your rewards for completing missions.
As long as it is active, this booster gives you double the bonus box rewards.

The max booster activates 5 boosters for the price of four. This pack includes the %BOOSTERNAME1%, %BOOSTERNAME2%, %BOOSTERNAME3%, %BOOSTERNAME4% and %BOOSTERNAME5%. All boosters are active for exactly %HOURS% hours from the time of purchase.
%BOOSTERVALUE%% quicker cooldown times for all ship and design skills. Booster is active for %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
%BOOSTERVALUE%% quicker cooldown times for all ship and design skills. Booster is for active %HOURS% hours of game time after purchase.
Adds a %BOOSTERVALUE%% bonus to the max. ship shield value, to all damage inflicted by players and while collecting XP. The booster will remain active for %HOURS% hours of game time.
Reinforces your P.E.T.'s hull and increases its HP
Your P.E.T. only runs when it's got fuel.
Once you activate this P.E.T gear, your P.E.T. will automatically collect bonus boxes and cargo boxes within close range.
Your P.E.T. can only be attacked by other players while it is collecting loot. Aliens cannot attack it.
Once you activate this P.E.T. gear, your P.E.T will automatically collect resources within close range.
Your P.E.T. can only be attacked by other players while it is collecting loot. Aliens cannot attack it.
Outfit your P.E.T with this gear and it'll automatically pinpoint every alien in the current star system.
With this gear on board your P.E.T., it will be able to track down nearby resources in the current star system.
The cargo trader makes it possible for your P.E.T. to trade cargo from anywhere in the galaxy at anytime.
The P.E.T. repairer will fix your P.E.T. by %amount% per second.
Not made for use in combat.
When your P.E.T. or ship is close to being destroyed, the Kamikaze Detonator will start the self-destruct sequence and explode, thereby taking out all enemies in the immediate vicinity.
When activated, the P.E.T. will be destroyed and will need to be repaired thereafter.
Repairs your ship during flight. Uses extra fuel for each repair.
Connects the Guard Mode to the new Insta Shield. Uses 35% more fuel when it's been activated.
Guard mode with an extra shield for the P.E.T.
The cargo protocol expands your cargo bay by %amount%%.
The radar protocol extends the range of all P.E.T. gear with a radar. The range of all collector and locator gear will increase by %amount%%.
The salvage protocol increases rewards for bonus and cargo boxes, collected by your P.E.T. by %amount%%.
The shield protocol boosts your P.E.T.'s shield power by %amount%%.
The laser protocol lets your P.E.T. cause %amount%% more laser damage.
The targeting protocol improves the accuracy of your P.E.T's lasers by %amount%%.
The evasion protocol makes it harder for your enemies to destroy your P.E.T. They'll have a %amount%% less chance of scoring a hit.
The HP protocol gives your P.E.T %amount%% more HP.
The alien protocol enables your P.E.T. to inflict %amount%% more damage to aliens.
With the fuel protocol, your P.E.T. will use %amount%% less fuel.

Augment your drone control unit with the Turtle Formation.

Increases shield power by 10%, but laser and rocket damage decrease by 7.5%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Turtle Formation.

Increase your shield power by 10%, but your laser and rocket damage decreases by 7.5%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Arrow Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 20%, but reduces laser damage by 3%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Arrow Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 20%, but reduces laser damage by 3%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Lance Formation.

Increases mine damage by 50%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Lance Formation.

Increases mine damage by 50%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Star Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 25%, but rocket launcher reload time increases by 33%, as well.

Augment your drone control unit with the Star Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 25%, but rocket launcher reload time increases by 33%, as well.

Augment your drone control unit with the Pincer Formation.

Increases laser damage by 3% against other players and provides an additional 5% honor point bonus. However, it reduces shield penetration by 10%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Pincer Formation.

Increases laser damage by 3% and provides an additional 5% honor point bonus. However, it reduces shield penetration by 10%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Double Arrow Formation.

Increases shield penetration by 10%, but reduces shield power by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Double Arrow Formation.

Increases shield penetration by 10%, but reduces shield power by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Diamond Formation.

Your shield regenerates 1% of your max shield power per second, up to a maximum of 5,000 per second. But hit points are reduced by 30%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Diamond Formation.

Your shield regenerates 1% of your max shield power per second, up to a maximum of 5,000 per second. But hit points are reduced by 30%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Chevron Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 50%, but reduces ship hit points by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Chevron Formation.

Increases rocket damage by 50%, but reduces ship hit points by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Moth Formation.

Increases shield penetration by 20%. Hit points are also increased by 20%. But it weakens your shield strength at a rate of 1% per second.

Augment your drone control unit with the Moth Formation.

Increases shield penetration by 20%. Hit points are also increased by 20%. But it weakens your shield strength at a rate of 1% per second.

Augment your drone control unit with the Crab Formation.

Increases shield absorption by 20%, but reduces speed by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Crab Formation.

Increases shield absorption by 20%, but reduces speed by 20%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Heart Formation.

Increases your shield power by 10% and your hit points by 20%. Laser damage is, however, reduced by 5%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Heart Formation.

Increases your shield power by 10% and your hit points by 20%. Laser damage is, however, reduced by 5%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Barrage Formation.

Increases laser damage to NPCs by 5% and provides an additional 5% XP from NPC kills. Shield Leech will, however, be reduced by 15%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Barrage Formation.

Increases laser damage to NPCs by 5% and provides an additional 5% XP from NPC kills. Shield Leech will, however, be reduced by 15%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Bat Formation.

Increase damage to NPCs by 8% and earn 8% more XP from NPC kills; however, your speed will be reduced by 15%.

Augment your drone control unit with the Bat Formation.

Increase damage to NPCs by 8% and earn 8% more XP from NPC kills; however, your speed will be reduced by 15%.
As long as you have 6 or more drones, you can use this formation any time after you've purchased it.

With a hangar hall, you can quickly switch ships while at homebase or even when logged out.
  • You may expand your hangar to include up to 10 HH-X.
A letter for the puzzle. When you completely spelled out the word, you'll receive a capsule for the lottery.
This ability allows you to temporarily redirect nearby enemy fire towards your ship.
This skill fortifies your ship with protective armor and increases its resistance to damage; however, it will immobilize your ship.
This ability deploys a protective shield around your ship and redirects a portion of the damage inflicted on all nearby group members to your ship.
This ability briefly increases your ship's speed, so you can quickly travel long distances.
This skill cloaks you, removes you from the minimap and prevents you from being targeted by other players.
This ability emits an interference field which paralyzes enemy ships' functions. All effects which they are currently using will be compromised.
This ability marks targets for your group and increases the damage caused by all outfit members.
This skill doubles your recon range on the mini map.
HP repair allows you to gradually restore the HP of allied ships.
This ability allows you to send new shield energy to a selected allied ship.
This ability makes the Aegis ship drop a repair pod to gradually repair all allied ships in the vicinity.
This skill cloaks you, removes you from the minimap and prevents you from being targeted by other players.

Nano-cluster:
Recovers 50% of your HP and 25% of your group members' HP.

Your shield takes 80% less damage from lasers.

Two Weeks of Premium Status:
For two weeks, you too can fire your rockets twice as fast, make repairs for free, and enjoy other Premium perks!

Two Weeks of Premium Status:
You are awarded Premium status for two weeks.
